content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I assist you with your HVAC needs today? May I have your name to get started?
Hi, it’s Melissa. My AC isn't working. It’s blowing hot air again.
Thank you, Melissa. I’m sorry to hear about your AC issue! Could you provide your address so I can check if you're within our service area and get help on the way?
215 East Maple. You better not charge me like last time. This is ridiculous, it keeps breaking.
Thank you for the address. I understand your frustration, Melissa. I’ll check our service area and get you information on the next steps. Would you like an estimate for the visit today?
Yeah, what is it going to cost me? Don’t give me that ‘depends on the issue’ line. Just tell me what you charge for showing up.

Of course, Melissa—I want you to feel informed. We charge a service call fee for our technician’s visit, and any additional costs for repairs are discussed before work begins. Would you like the estimated service call fee for HVAC diagnostics?
Obviously. Why would I want you out here if I don’t know? You guys charge too much. How much just to LOOK at it? If you tell me it’s like last time I’m canceling.

Our standard service call fee for HVAC diagnostics is $79. This covers the technician’s visit and assessment. If any repairs are needed, you’ll get a quote before we do anything else. Would you like to book the soonest available appointment?
UGH. That’s way more than it should be. Ridiculous. Other places do it for less. What if you guys have to come back again? I’m tired of paying for the same thing over and over.

I totally understand, Melissa, and I’m sorry for any inconvenience you’ve experienced. Our technicians do everything they can to fix the issue on the first visit. If additional follow-up is needed shortly after service, please let us know—we want to make it right. Would you like to schedule a technician for today?
That better not mean you’ll charge me another $79 if it breaks again. This is getting absurd. I swear if you do, I’m going on review sites. You guys are always trying to rip people off.

If the same issue recurs right after our visit, please contact us—we aim to resolve repeat issues as quickly as possible, and we do our best to avoid repeat charges. I want to help you get this fixed. What’s your ideal time for a technician to come by today, or would another day work better?
You know what, forget it. I’m not paying another dime to you people. This is a scam. I’ll figure it out myself.
reason: Customer declined to book due to price concerns.
